segment.source: Deploy Internet Explorer 11 using software distribution tools
segment.target: Deploy Internet Explorer 11 using software distribution tools

segment.source: Deploy Internet Explorer 11 using software distribution tools (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Deploy Internet Explorer 11 using software distribution tools (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Deploy Internet Explorer 11 using software distribution tools
segment.target: Deploy Internet Explorer 11 using software distribution tools

segment.source: If you already manage software distribution and updates on your network through software distribution tools, you can also use these tools for ongoing deployments of Internet Explorer.
segment.target: If you already manage software distribution and updates on your network through software distribution tools, you can also use these tools for ongoing deployments of Internet Explorer.

segment.source: System Center R2 2012 System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager.
segment.target: System Center R2 2012 System Center 2012 R2 Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Deploy and install Internet Explorer 11 on your user's computers through a software distribution package.
segment.target: Deploy and install Internet Explorer 11 on your user's computers through a software distribution package.

segment.source: For more information about using this tool, see System Center R2 2012 Configuration Manager.
segment.target: For more information about using this tool, see System Center R2 2012 Configuration Manager.

segment.source: Download a single copy of the IE11 updates, caching them to local servers so your users' computers can receive the updates directly from the WSUS servers, instead of through Windows Update.
segment.target: Download a single copy of the IE11 updates, caching them to local servers so your users' computers can receive the updates directly from the WSUS servers, instead of through Windows Update.

segment.source: For more information about using this tool, see Windows Server Update Services.
segment.target: For more information about using this tool, see Windows Server Update Services.

segment.source: Deploy and install IE11 on your user's computers through a combination of Group Policy and Microsoft Active Directory.
segment.target: Deploy and install IE11 on your user's computers through a combination of Group Policy and Microsoft Active Directory.

segment.source: For more information about using this tool, see Group Policy Software Installation overview.
segment.target: For more information about using this tool, see Group Policy Software Installation overview.

segment.source: Add the IE11 update to your deployment share, using MDT to update your previously-deployed Windows image.
segment.target: Add the IE11 update to your deployment share, using MDT to update your previously-deployed Windows image.

segment.source: For more information about using this tool, see Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT).
segment.target: For more information about using this tool, see Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT).
